Row.Text: The Panzer is the German unique unit, replacing the Landship. It is both stronger and faster than the Landship. It also can move after combat, allowing it to blow huge holes in enemy lines and then barrel through before the enemy can repair the gap.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Panzer is the German unique unit, replacing the Landship. It is both stronger and faster than the Landship. It also can move after combat, allowing it to blow huge holes in enemy lines and then barrel through before the enemy can repair the gap.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]The Panzer is the German unique unit, replacing the Landship. It is both stronger and faster than the Landship. It also can move after combat, allowing it to blow huge holes in enemy lines and then barrel through before the enemy can repair the gap.
Fast and powerful late game Unit.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Only the Germans may build it. This Unit is stronger and has one additional movement compared to the Landship, which it replaces.
